name_of_collaborative.name: Transition Digital
name_of_collaborative.tagline: Transition Digital is a nonprofit collaborative founded by Climate Policy Radar, Transition Zero, Clay, and Radiant Earth. Together, we bring deep expertise in climate, data, AI, and transition modeling. Our collective experience and strong ties in the climate and tech communities position us to advance rapidly and effectively, leveraging economies of scale and scope.

founding_collaborators.name: Climate Policy Radar
founding_collaborators.tagline: Organising, analysing and democratising data on climate law and policy documents, leveraging AI and NLP to build open databases and applications.

founding_collaborators.name: TransitionZero
founding_collaborators.tagline: Open data, software and insights for energy transition planning decisions.

founding_collaborators.name: Clay
founding_collaborators.tagline: Scaling public benefit from Earth data through foundation geoAI

founding_collaborators.name: Radiant Earth
founding_collaborators.tagline: Supports accessible data initiatives for global environmental cooperation.

secondary_collaborators.name: Grantham Research Institute on Climate Change and the Environment
